Version information about the library and Trackerboy application.

Types

Version = object
  major*: Natural
  minor*: Natural
  patch*: Natural
Data type for a semantic version. A semantic version consists of a major, minor and patch number.   Source   Edit

Consts

currentFileMajor = 1
The current major revision of the file format   Source   Edit 
currentFileMinor = 1
The current minor revision of the file format   Source   Edit 
currentVersion = (major: 0, minor: 7, patch: 0)
libtrackerboy version   Source   Edit

Procs

func `$`(v: Version): string {....raises: [ValueError], tags: [].}
Convert a Version to a string. The string has the format "major.minor.patch".   Source   Edit 
func `<=`(lhs: Version; rhs: Version): bool {....raises: [], tags: [].}
<= operator for comparing two Versions. Returns true if rhs is a newer or equivalent version compared to lhs.   Source   Edit 
func `<`(lhs: Version; rhs: Version): bool {....raises: [], tags: [].}
< operator for comparing two Versions. Returns true if rhs is a newer version than lhs.   Source   Edit

Templates

template v(m = 0; n = 0; p = 0): Version
Shorthand for initializing Version objects ie v(0, 1, 0) ==> Version(major: 0, minor: 1, patch: 0)   Source   Edit
